scripts.dev: npm run build:packages && npm run dev:api & npm run dev:web
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w packages/game-engine && npm run build -w packages/database
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w packages/game-engine && npm run build -w packages/database && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.build:api: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w packages/game-engine && npm run build -w packages/database && npm run build -w apps/api
scripts.build:web: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/web
